story_21_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I haven’t thanked you yet, Bruno and Brawly.
If I hadn’t teamed up with you, I wouldn’t have
gotten this strong.
story_21_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
No need to thank us.
We all got stronger by being together.
story_21_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I guess that’s just the kind of synergy that
Fighting-type fanatics like us create!
story_21_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: But we’re not the ultimate team yet!
story_21_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Exactly. We still have a ways to go on that path,
but we will continue to battle on!
story_21_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
We have all greatly improved our strength since
forming a team together here on Pasio!
story_21_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
We have transcended both superior and
overwhelming power—get ready for our
SUPREME power!
